data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Throw-in high up the field for Urawa in Suita.
In the minute 4, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Yosuke Ideguchi (Gamba) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Urawa's half?
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Urawa.
In Suita, Kazuma Watanabe of Gamba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Urawa's area.
In the minute 18, In Suita Urawa drive forward through Yuki Muto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shinya Yajima for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 24, Goal! Takahiro Sekine gives Urawa a 0-1 lead.
Leonardo with an assist there.
Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 32, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Urawa.
Urawa have been awarded a penalty...
Leonardo smashes in a penalty at Panasonic Stadium Suita. The score is now 0-2.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Urawa.
Gamba's Takashi Usami breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Urawa to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Free kick Gamba.
Goal kick for Urawa at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
The home team replace Kazuma Watanabe with Ademilson.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
The home team have replaced Yuji Ono with Yasuhito Endo. This is the second substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
Gamba are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Goal kick for Urawa at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gamba drives forward and Ademilson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Urawa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Goal! Urawa extend their lead to 0-3 through Yuki Muto.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Kazuki Nagasawa.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Urawa throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Gamba.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
In the minute 60, Goal! Yosuke Ideguchi pulls one back for Gamba to make it 1-3.
Takashi Usami instrumental with a fine assist.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 62, Gamba make their third substitution with Shu Kurata replacing Kosuke Onose.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Kenyu Sugimoto is replacing Yuki Muto for the away team.
In the minute 64, Koya Yuruki is on a sub for Takahiro Sekine for Urawa.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Gamba throw-in in Urawa's half.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
In the minute 67, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's third substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Kai Shibato replacing Ewerton.
Urawa's Kenyu Sugimoto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 68, Hiroki Kasahara awards Gamba a goal kick.
Gamba make their fifth substitution with Patric replacing Takashi Usami.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a fourth substitution, with Yuya Fukuda replacing Hiroki Fujiharu.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Urawa.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 73, Ademilson of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Urawa needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Ball safe as Urawa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Patric (Gamba) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 80, Takuya Iwanami is replacing Leonardo for Urawa at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 83, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Urawa.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Urawa a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Urawa in their own half.
Free kick Gamba.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
Hiroki Kasahara will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Gamba throw-in in Urawa's half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Urawa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
That's full-time at Panasonic Stadium Suita. The final score is 1-3.
Kenyu Sugimoto (Urawa) has received a first yellow card.
At Panasonic Stadium Suita, Masaaki Higashiguchi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
